name: m3u8-player-launcher
description: Chrome extension to detect and play m3u8 streaming files

scripts.build: tsc -b && vite build && pnpm run copy-files && pnpm run clean-dist-src
scripts.copy-files: cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp popup.html dist/popup.html && cp popup.js dist/popup.js && cp icon_16.png dist/icon_16.png && cp icon_48.png dist/icon_48.png && cp icon_128.png dist/icon_128.png
scripts.build-zip: pnpm run build && pnpm run zip
